scenario.text: AITA for not wanting my son to play videogames | My son (14) is an exemplary boy, studies, has good grades, does his chores in home, etc. But recently he has find a new hobby, videogames. Now I’m not one of those parents that think that videogames transform kids in killers. But I think he could be doing something more productive. I don’t want him wasting his time with some games. Luckily he is still doing good in school but I think He should do something else like practicing a sport or a new language, or maybe reading books, anything that isn’t being in front of a screen for hours. I tried to convince him but he doesn’t her me. AITA? Am i being irrational or something?
